title: About the Size of the Universe
description: Time does not last forever, there is no doubt about his power. Here is the family history that begins in the book Pisces has no feet (2013) and stretches from North Fjords to Keflavik today, with a visit to the Middle Hedge. Here is the story of love, which is a sacrifice and balance of life and death, a crushed fist, Elvis Presley, who opens the hearts and stars of heaven, each in the fire of the sun.
author: Jón Kalman Stefánsson
